comment.body: 测试
终于正常了，哈哈~
@Lmath: 好久之前你就关注我了呀~

@莱文倩: 实际上，中国用户喜欢刷知乎还有一个原因是知乎最初所执行的精英化策略，通过给各位dalao发送邀请码邀请加入这个社区互相分享一些人生的经验，让这个社区在几年内迅速的充实了起来。而且因为最初都是实行实名制，没有那些开着小号去黑人撕逼或者勾心斗角的名堂，骂人也不会撕破脸，装逼立刻会被打趴下，因此受到了普通大众的欢迎，甚至因为邀请资格十分难得甚至出现了一号千金难求的情况。后来知乎逐步开放注册，从邀请到限制到完全放开，用户数量在剧增的同时可以很明显的感觉到戾气也在加重，失去了实名制更是出现了知乎女神等一票人物，很多元老看不惯现在的知乎而纷纷删号退出，那些真正厉害的回答者和贡献者也因为和后面加入的新人各种不愉快而离开了这里，最终劣币逐良币，成了人民的社区，而不是精英的。。
But ...It seems that I can't watch the video in your site..I tryed chrome and firefox, and proxy or vpn, and IPFS daemon... however, I still can't watch the video...

@Loligod: Yes..I think so..but I only have to wait ipfs connect  a direct peer who has the file, I think maybe we can offer other way to download the file to deal ipfs be block or can't connect to enough peers in some place..

@Loligod: and why not add a button `pin this prroject`?现在的话必须得一个个点开那些视频再去pin才行。。或许你可以使用这一命令：`ipfs add -r folder_name`， then it will give your a folder hash, people can use it to pin all file in the folder

sad..
Hi, I think you should see this:http://www.bento4.com/downloads/  , 'mp4fragment' can convert mp4 file to Fragmented mp4(fMP4), and 100% support streaming ：）
@Loligod: I had used chrome dev tool to emulate slow internet speed(like 2G or 3G), It seems better than mp4, no need to wait too much time

@Loligod: ipfs is slowly in some country，include China， and nature mp4 moov box maybe at header, footer, or other place, it will let browser receive more data to begin play, and people need more time to wait, but fmp4 is streaming and moov box in file header, so, browser only need load some data to start play and save visitor's time, pin file also need too much time to download, so.. I think let's people pin file and wait to play not a good idea.
@Loligod: Okay..I think I need study and test more😂
